message.body: Did you make it to grandmas?
Yup and everyone had some of the beans, good stuff
Sweet(: im eating blue cheese hehe. I love you and I'll ttyl
Meep no need. I'll tty after dindin
Okay ttya babe :) jelly tho
Love you :) ciao
My parents love the cookies hehe(:
Nice :) the forgotten ones are my favorite
The meringue ones? You still at dinner?
Anyway I'm watching a movie with my parents, happy Xmas feast(:
Aww, and the debt! Ps anytime we wanna watch movies we can hete(: but my dad is annoying about me texting during movies so I can't talk to you much. Meh wish you were here
Sorry, was putting together the trike for Bella. But what movie?
Nvm apparently he's gonna be chill about it now
Oh okay sweet. Sorry will text back faster now. How's the movie?
No worries love(: an it just started. What're you guys up to?
Watching elf but also just chilling and talking and such. How's ma and pa
Aww nice ha, haven't seen that one on a while:P and good, just chillin. I love you
Aww nice ha, haven't seen that one on a while:P and good, just chillin. I love you
I love you too :) and that's the best dood! Love elf hehe. Imma send you a pic of this trike sho sick
Hah who got it for her? Early present? And yes, best movie! But fast five is on here!! Should watch it!
Oh shit! I'm down with that dood! And she's asleep, but we built it up.
That's awesob!!! Is that what zack got her? And yeah, my dad doesn't mind if we buy movies
What's cranky Vern doin? I wanna be witchu meh:/ sorryim ridic
Nah, from Erik and such. So many presents for her. And oh that's nice :) meh cranky verb
Vern
Cuz I just wanna be with you and you know can't be without you:P and ah really? What's he saying? And yeah I know, nbd
How are you ridic? And yelling at his ma... And I wana be with you too have
Fuck I have bad service here sorry
They left now, but he's just inconsiderate and makes shit awkward. And babe I love you so much, and you're perfect the way you are :) I wana be with you right now
Ugh that's no good, what was he flipping about? Aww Johnny I love you, you're amazing. Ah same, wish yiu were here
Wish I was there too babe. And about how she didn't know Ben and Paula were staying there. Don't matter now tho.
That's weird, doesn't seem like a big deal. Whatee yiu guys up to now?
Eating chocalate and gonna play taboo soon, like the game. What're u doing?
A game where you guess words where you're restricted from using certain words. But game time babe, ttya love.
I love you :) ciao
What's taboo? Aww your family is cute meh im jelly. And the movie watching
What's up?
You didn't get it? I'm sorry, I love yiu darling
How was the game?
Babe?
You didn't respond bye or I love you?
I love you too babe and yeah bad service here. And still playing but hah my sister is so competitive
Meh I'm jealous, I wanna play games and have a big family. Ugh meh want you
I wana be with you too babe, meh wish I cud. Fun game tho, we shall play some time
Well yiu have to play with a big group right? And me too this sucks, fuck
Yeah sorta, and what're you up to? Sorry it was my turn, but done now
Don't worry, nbd. And still watching the movie. I hope I can see yiu tmrw
I hope i can too love, and is it good? Meh wana watch a movie with you
Yeah it's real good, but sad fuck. And me too, tnrw I hope we can, I miss yiu
I miss you heaps love and think I'm sleeping here btw. Tmrw we shall have :)
At your grandmas? Yeah yiu said :/ meh. And yes tmrw, fast five Yeee
Yeah yeah, and for sho. And woot! So down babe! Love you Sara
I love you too, just wish you were here. Gah I am ridiculous. And crazy. But yes so you need to come over tmrw and well watch it
You said btw twice, but you mean ten in the morning? For what.
Wait, can you come here tmrw btw babe at ten or whenever btw love.
For breakfast and fun :) hah that was an awkward text. Are you free, cuz yous welcome!
Aren't you guys gonna open presents then? At your grandmas?
Yeah well we start at nine or so. Just come if you want :) we have one present here for you
Haha ojay, well if my parents let me I'll come(: but gotta be back at one you know, for Xmas lunch, which you're welcome to btw. And mreow how late does your Xmas dinner usually go?
Wish wish
Fuxking missed it. Uh idk, five or so? Maybe six? Hmph well maybe tmrw morning won't work. They said after presents
I'm sorry, yeah well no worries, I'll just see you after six or something. I figured that morning wouldn't work for you
Yeah too crazy here and such. But I love you :) and it's almost christmas! Woot!
Yayyyyyy baby Jesus! Whoop! And I live you too. So plan on seeing you around six?
Yeah we shall plan for that :) and woot baby Jesus hell yeah! Even though he was born in march?
Meh that's late, but okay. Why don't our food times coincide ): and yeah well April and may or something
Idk meh, they're like directly off from each other. Maybe I'll come over for yours? And weird we celebrate it now
Right now? What's going on?
Fucj idk why talking to my grandpa or thinking about him makes me cry
Yeah idk why, and well figure it out tnrw or something, wish something would work out
And nothing, just talking to him and miss him
Idk meh, well hopefully something does :) and ah I got you. How's he doing?
Yeah that'd be nice if it does, just wanna be with you. He's Doing fine, he says hi hah, he calls you John. Fuck just wanna be with you
I wana be with you too love, so badly meh:/ and hi! And that's chill, don't mind it.
Hehe yeah he's old, he's a classy guy, hope you can meet him. And what're you guys up to? You ginna be up later? I wanna call you good night after presents
And everyone's asleep now hah, like I just brushed my teeth. And got in bed. And I hope I can meet him too
Oh wow hah, that's early. Well nvm then, should I let you go sleep?
Yeah don't worry, you can sleep babe(: ah dang, so early! May I ask why my morning invitAtion was revoked?
No you're all good. But gonna be going to sleep soon I think since we're planning to open presents at eight.
Well cuz my ma and sister said it might be awkward I guess, idk. And yeah I know way early! Sucks!
Oh okay, well i was just wondering. So why so early? Yiu should just sleep now
I'll goto sleep at midnight, and idk why, just how the family rolls. To get it outta the way I guess.
Oh okay, well I'll open presents then and then just talk to you in the morning when I wake up.
Okay for sho sounds like a plan. You okay babe?
Yes I am tired and just want to sleep and be with you. Ugh present time and I'm just tired and want to sleep and be with you and your family doesn't want me and I'm feeling insecure and pmsy
My family does want you! Just cuz no presents for you and such. I love you babe :) and hope you get sweet presents! Miss you! Shall we part?
Whatever don't worry about it. Yeah it's present time so I'll ttyl. I love you, sweet dreams, have fun tomorrow and text me after you're done with presents. I love you
I love you so much Sara. And I'll text you after presents. Miss you dear, and happy Christmas :) ciao for now darling
I love you so much Johnny, merry Christmas darling(: wish you were here
I love you so much Sara and wishing you a merry Christmas early this morning hah. Miss you dear
Good morning! You suck for texting me so early. What're you up to?
I love youu, and miss you, and wanna be with you
Opening presents still hah, taking forever. Sowy, I love you :)
Get any sweet presents?
My phone is sucking! Sorry
Why you no pick up? It's not in the Christmas spirit to ignore your girlfriend ):
Oh okay, well you coulda picked up and just said that. Text me after or something, or call me if I don't respond cuz obviously I haven't gotten your message
They there?
We are now going to see grandpa, running so late
Wait now? I thought you said one? Did you have dinner already?
Johnny?
No we didn't, but everyone was really lagging and I had to setup the tables and such. How's your meal?
Oh wow, well mine is pretty much over, just talking now. Kinda wish I had known about yours tho. Was olanning on seeing uou around six ish yiu know. How is everyone?
You shud come over still then :) it'll be fine. And alright, Liz lost her wallet and was freaking but all is well now. Driving to the cemetery still tho
Well alright, but I don't wanna interrupt your dinner, so just hit me up after I guess. I'll see you at some point tonight. I hope tere aren't too many tears
I hope there aren't too many either. And well you won't be interrupting, but plan for around then still :)
Well yeah I will. That's why I was hoping you'd be done by then. Anyway hit me up after the cemetery. I love you
I love you too :) ma says you can come over at like 430 btw love. You're welcome for food or to just chill
Just call me when you're home an well figure it out. Love you
Yeah, do it!
Should I snag a bottle of wine?
Got it, and on my way(:
Sweet :)
Park at urban?
I
Long lines
Meh I'm sorry ):
Es okie
Nah, but at the pannikin we will!
I should?
Yee
